messages.title: Denise’s pledge to Bolsover people:
messages.content: Denise will back Vince Cable's economic recovery plans as the ONLY way Bolsover can recover from Labour's disastrous recession.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Back Vince Cable’s economic recovery plans as the only way to recover from Labour’s recession.
Stand up for local Royal Hospital’s front line services against Labour's national programme to slash £20 Billion over the next three years.
Fight for fairer funding for Derbyshire Police and schools.
Local domination and chronic underfunding in Derbyshire must stop.

issues.economy: Denise supports Vince Cable’s economic recovery plans.
issues.education: Labour’s local domnination and chronic underfunding for education must stop.
issues.health: Opposes Labour’s plan to slash £20 Billion from Royal Hospital’s services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Denise believes politicians should be accessible, so if elected Bolsover will have a fully staffed MP’s office for the first time. As a Rotherham Councillor and mother of 4 children and local politician, she is in touch with the real life problems people face. She believes that Bolsover deserves better.

images.caption: Denise Hawksworth, Vince Cable and the Liberal Democrats are heading for shock victories in this election.
